item.title: [667/718] Donator
item.dc:creator: @NukeRune NukeRune
item.description:
@NukeRune wrote:

Hi there,
First of before we begin: This is my very very first guide so please do not hate.

This command will only be avaible for Extreme Donators, not Regular Donators.
Okay, today i’m going to learn you guys how to add a Extreme Donator command.

Under:

Add:

There we go we’ve just made a Extreme Donator only command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND_HERE")) { if (player.isExtremeDonator()) { player.sendMessage("TEXT_HERE"); return true; }

Also you can make a messege telling the Regular Donators, that they’re not allowed to use this command:

if (!player.isExtremeDonator()) { player.sendMessage("You have to be a Extreme Donator to use this!");

Thank-you alot for using my Snippet!

Read full topic
